game_name: Vrainers. The E-Learning of the Future
game_description: Train in an emotional, interactive and safe environment! The App allows people to train and learn the Public Speaking, Storytelling and Mindfulness. You will have access to two types of content: theoretical and practical. The theory will be managed by our Virtual Coach, Tony! In the second part, it will be possible to practice in front of a real room of people and test your skills in a realistic and natural environment. We will insert updates: as far as language is concerned, we will insert new communication terms; new modules, chapters and will be added to allow anyone to go deeper and deeper into the subject until they become an expert. Our simulations will increase, allowing more people from different sectors to reach their needs.
review_1: Fantastic app with immense potential. I am using it for preparing my speeches. Finally, we can see some very useful use cases in this VR space that go beyond gaming.
